title: Person of Interest - 5x12 '.exe' - Deploying The Virus
author: POISuit
comment:
Samaritan:
- I am inevitable
Harold:
- And I am Harold Finch

"Eight letters? You knew all along."

The feels when you hear The Machine say this and see that beautiful mix of sadness and pride in Harold's face. 💔
I think it's the first time Harold has referred to the Machine as "her"....

I like this after watching the "ultimate dialogue" clip again. Harold would never choose to give up the password to the Machine. And the Machine would never go against his wishes. But with Harold dead, the Machine would still have struck against Samaritan, in order to carry out what it (she!) knew he wanted.
Best rendition of "It's a Wonderful Life" TV trope ever.
